description: Ahmad Khan Rahami, 28, was taken into custody on Monday, in connection with bombings in Manhattan and New Jersey on Saturday. He was wounded in a gunfight with the police.
title: Manhattan Blast Suspect Arrested
title_page: Manhattan Blast Suspect Arrested - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Ahmad Khan Rahami, 28, was taken into custody on Monday, in connection with bombings in Manhattan and New Jersey on Saturday. He was wounded in a gunfight with the police.
